ComicInfo.Title: The Sufferin' Bastard; Getting Into "Weirdo" by Indulging the Self-Centered Psyche of.... Aline Kominsky-Crumb!; Thinking About the Lone Ranger; Ten Dollars for Two Minutes; Mother Hulda; Squirmin' Sherman; The Talker; Dennis the Sullen Menace; Young Ledicker; Sex Crazed Housewife
